definitions.body: crush, trample upon (‖ form of [[שׁוּף]] (q.v.), if pointing right, cf. Kö:i. 439; We Now read [[שָׁאפִים]], etc., from [[שׁוּף]], cf. Hi Dr; but Dr thinks Vulgate poss. original: crush the heads of the poor upon the dust [cf. Is 3:15], in any case del.
